ModMetaData.name: Fortification Industrial - Frontier
ModMetaData.author: AobaKuma
ModMetaData.description:
when the first shot of the war was fired. there must be a man, who fought back against our enemy at the frontier. we may not able to know his name, but we remember his fearlessness.
when the first casualties of war occurred. there must be a man, who giving his life to the future of his country. we may not able to know his name, but we remember his sacrifice.
a single man has fallen, and the men will waken. becasue there still a front, to the war we fought.
